item.description:
STARTING THIS WEEK THE WALNUT BEACH PAVILION IN THE DEVON SECTION OF MILFORD IS HAVING BANDS EVERY SUNDAY AT 4 PM. THIS WEEKS BAND IS A GREAT BAND CALLED REMEMBER SEPTEMBER AND NEXT WEEK IT’S PRIMETIME.

SO IF YOU’RE NOT DOING ANYTHING STOP DOWN THIS SUNDAY JULY 15 AT 4 PM AND CHECK THEM OUT. IT’S UNDER THE PAVILION SO RAIN OR SHINE IT’S ON. ALSO IF YOU WANT TO STOP DOWN EARLIER AND ENJOY THE BEACH IT’S ONE OF THE BETTER ONES IN MILFORD.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: REMEMBER SEPTEMBER @ WALNUT BEACH MILFORD SUNDAY JULY 15th @ 4pm
